text.name: longdescription
text.text: The Model 3 system was the culmination of the collaboration with Lockheed Martin. It had three main PCBs (CPU/Video/ROM). Had 4 versions (1.0,1.5 '96,2.0 '97,2.1 '98). CPU: IBM PowerPC 603 @66/100/166MHz, 8MB RAM, Video: Lockheed Martin Real3D/Pro-1000, Sound: Motorola 68EC000, Release date '96.
